statements: DELETE FROM bioenergy_projects WHERE project_id = 101 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM bioenergy_projects WHERE cost > 10000 OR revenue < 5000;
DELETE FROM RevenueProjections WHERE project_name = 'Project X' AND revenue_category = 'Marketing';
DELETE FROM RevenueProjections WHERE project_name = 'Project A';
DELETE FROM RevenueProjections WHERE revenue_amount > 10000 AND project_name = 'Project A';
DELETE FROM CostData WHERE cost_type = 'Labor' OR cost_amount < 5000;
DELETE FROM CostData WHERE project_name = 'Project A';
DELETE FROM project_teams WHERE team_member = 'Alice' AND role = 'Developer';
